DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , 26-week , open-label , single-arm multi-center pilot study . Eligible patient receive open-label treatment rivastigmine capsule plus memantine tablet add therapy . This study design evaluate safety tolerability add therapy memantine rivastigmine capsule patient probable AD ( MMSE 10-20 )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Rivastigmine With Add-on Memantine Patients With Probable Alzheimer 's Disease
